sentence.Network_en: An independent opinion poll published today shows growing discontent with the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天发表的一项独立民意测验表明民众对政府的不满正与日俱增。

sentence.Network_en: Any signs of discontent tend to be magnified and overanalyzed.
sentence.Network_cn: 稍有不满便会被上纲上线。

sentence.Network_en: The discontent has been fuelled by allegations of corruption in high places.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于身居高位者腐败行为的指控更激起了人们的不满。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... discomfort 不安 discontent 不满 discord 不调和.
急求常用的英语单词_百度知道 ... discomfort 不舒服 discontent 不满足 discrimination 歧视；区别.
石油词汇英语翻译(CD) ... disconnector 隔离开关 discontent 不平 discontentedness 不满意.
i have heard there was some discontent ., 我听说了那里有些不满情绪.

list.abs: he tried to sow discontent among us .他企图在我们中间散布不满情绪。
Character  - Chinese Character... ... 埋怨[ complain;growl;grumble] 民怨[ popular discontent] 惹怨[ incur hatred].
They are the focus of political discontent and agitation ., 他们是政治不满和骚乱的症结所在.

entry.def: Discontent is the feeling that you have when you are not satisfied with your situation.

example.ex: There are reports of widespread discontent in the capital.
example.tran: 有报道称首都弥漫着不满的情绪。

means.word_mean: 1. a longing for something better than the present situation
1. showing or experiencing dissatisfaction or restless longing;

sentences.sentence: "saw many discontent faces in the room"

auth_sentence.content: There is much discontent in Italy and the Netherlands.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is much discontent in Italy and the Netherlands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is much discontent in Italy and the Netherlands.

auth_sentence.content: This is the summer of discontent for bank customers.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the summer of discontent for bank customers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the summer of discontent for bank customers.

auth_sentence.content: Viscount Melbourne...blamed all discontent upon a rabble of agitators.
auth_sentence.res_content: Viscount Melbourne...blamed all discontent upon a rabble of agitators.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Viscount Melbourne...blamed all discontent upon a rabble of agitators.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站得住脚的,无懈可击的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+able能……的→能拿住的
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站不住脚的,防守不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+tenable[adj.站得住脚的,无懈可击的]→adj.站不住脚的,防守不住的
con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,保持,生活费用
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man手+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→用手拿住→维修,坚持
sus下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acity表名词→tenacious名词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 租赁期限;租佃,租用,租赁
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+ancy表名词→拿[钱]租房
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ure表名词→拿住状态
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
fas+ten拿住,握住,支撑→v.[使]固定，系牢，绑紧，扣紧
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人

sentences.en: The present wave of strikes stems from discontent among the lower-paid.
sentences.cn: 当前的罢工浪潮起因于低工资雇员们的不满情绪。
观众因不满而嗡嗡地说话。

sentences.en: The Labour Party swept in on a tide of discontent over rising prices.
sentences.cn: 工党在对物价上涨不满的浪潮声中轻而易举地当选了。
